title: Nonupo
summary: A mathy game where you and an opponent place numbers on a grid to get the score closest to 0. My first object-oriented project, affectionately made in Flash.
long_summary: A mathy game where you and an opponent place numbers on a grid to get the score closest to 0. It was my first object-oriented project, affectionately made in Flash. Somehow back then, I made an AI that's still capable of beating me in this game today. But maybe, that's just because I'm bad at the game...

gallery.caption: Performing a roll has a sweet little animation
